alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Monroe; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 2:59PM CDT until April 13 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Prairie County in central Arkansas... Central Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ulm, or near Stuttgart, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Clarendon... Holly Grove... Ulm... Roe... Alfrey... Dobbs Landing... Palmer... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Blackton... Aberdeen... Monroe... Casscoe... Pine City... Keevil... Lawrenceville... Duncan... Almyra Airport... Ragtown... Louisiana Purchase State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern and southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern and southeastern Arkansas.
